All i can really say is goto www.everlore.com...but that's if you want a
spoiler on how to do the quest.


Zainal ....Bertoxx
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Master Charrick [SMTP:mastercharrick@...]
> Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 2:03 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] a question
>
> I am new to a lot of this... so bare with me... I have lurked only a week
> but thought someone here should be able to help... can anyone.... help me
> with this problem...
>
> I was finishing up the steel warrior quest, given a key to a pen # 5 and
> told to go into the pen on the left along the wall with the three doors
> when I went in there, there was nothing there... did I do something wrong
>
> I was holding the key at the time I had clicked it to the door and
> everything... but nothing happened...
>
> please help if you can... thanks
>
